import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./sidebar.css" import logo from '../../assets/logo.png'; export default function SideBar() { const [toggle, showMenu] =useState(false) const date = new Date().getFullYear();; return ( <>
Copyright ©{date} All Right Reserved
showMenu(!toggle)}>
) }
